kv3.4:2.3_1: ekadesaṁ sotāpattiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv3.4:2.3_3: ekadesaṁ sattakkhattuparamo kolaṅkolo ekabījī buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato dhamme …pe… saṅghe …pe… ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato,
kv3.4:3.3_1: ekadesaṁ sakadāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv3.4:4.3_1: ekadesaṁ anāgāmiphalappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv3.4:4.3_2: ekadesaṁ na kāyena phusitvā viharati, ekadesaṁ antarāparinibbāyī, upahaccaparinibbāyī, asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī, uddhaṁsotoakaniṭṭhagāmī,
kv3.4:5.3_1: ekadesaṁ arahattappatto paṭiladdho adhigato sacchikato upasampajja viharati, kāyena phusitvā viharati,
kv3.4:5.3_3: ekadesaṁ vītarāgo vītadoso vītamoho …pe… ekadesaṁ sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ,
kv3.4:7.5_0: “tassa evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccati,
kv3.4:8.4_0: “so evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṁ khayañāṇāya cittaṁ abhininnāmetī”ti.
kv3.4:9.3_0: Atthi cittaṁ rajjamānaṁ dussamānaṁ muyhamānaṁ kilissamānanti?
kv3.4:9.5_0: nanu rattañceva arattañca, duṭṭhañceva aduṭṭhañca, mūḷhañceva amūḷhañca, chinnañceva achinnañca, bhinnañceva abhinnañca, katañceva akatañcāti?
kv3.4:9.7_0: Hañci rattañceva arattañca, duṭṭhañceva aduṭṭhañca, mūḷhañceva amūḷhañca, chinnañceva achinnañca, bhinnañceva abhinnañca, katañceva akatañca, no ca vata re vattabbe—
